subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 19 points, Plenette Pierson had 10 of her 14 down the stretch and the Liberty beat the San Antonio Silver Stars, 81-75.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 19 points, Plenette Pierson had 10 of her 14 down the stretch and the Liberty beat the San Antonio Silver Stars, 81-75.
